extendedInfo.description: Turns your android phone into a Wi-Fi analyzer!!Shows the Wi-Fi channels around you. Helps you to find a less crowded channel for your wireless router.

reviews.title: A MUST Have! When out & about :D
reviews.comment: 5 Stars!!! Much appreciation for years & one of my priorities for installation on any new device Couldn\'t be without this brilliant app it just does every time what my phone seems unable to do... ThankYooooo!
reviews.author: Rachelle Hillhouse

reviews.title: Best!
reviews.comment: Very useful and reliable. Allows you to find the best access point and best channel too!
reviews.author: Michel Bodenheimer

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I found the application very useful, to configure my wireless network and achieve faster and more stable connections.
reviews.author: Nikolaos Tsarmpopoulos

reviews.title: Superb App!
reviews.comment: Using Wifi Analyzer made selecting an empty channel to improve our home network a breeze. Straightforward graphics for easy reading-> very intuitive.
reviews.author: Jeff Stormer

reviews.title: Amazing app !
reviews.comment: Nice, simple and easy !  Helps in managing WiFi channel easily... Thanks for this gr8 app :)
reviews.author: Abhishek Gogia

reviews.title: A must have
reviews.comment: I find this app very useful in finding the best channel for my wireless network in competition from the neigborhood wifi. I use this information to establish the most stable network possible, which makes my family happy.
reviews.author: Don Johnson

reviews.title: Clean and efficient.
reviews.comment: This is a perfect home survey tool helping newbies optimising their WiFi setup without resulting to excessive power jacking.  Clean and simple interface, and good features to intelligibility ratio!
reviews.author: Valentin-Erich Mihut

reviews.title: Excellent one
reviews.comment: I don\'t think I expect anything more from this app. I relocated my Wi-Fi modem to get best signal coverage in my entire house. It works!
reviews.author: Sangeet Kumar Jain

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Helped me find access point at campsite, and also choose the best channels for my access points at home. Is there a pro version? It\'d be nice to get rid of the ads.
reviews.author: Stephen Blott

reviews.title: pretty nifty
reviews.comment: works well on my old droid charge. cheap (free) and easy wifi site survey tool.
reviews.author: Kenny G

reviews.title: Very handy tool
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Everyone should install this, and use it to show iPhone users just how limited ios is!
reviews.author: Peter Cudmore

reviews.title: Samsung G-S3
reviews.comment: I can\'t do without this app. Its awesome.  Forget the rest.... This is the best.  Been using it since my G-S1 and the first app I installed on my G-S3.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very well done
reviews.comment: I\'ve used this intermittently in the past. Just this week though I had need of it as I plan a second access point in my house - just showing the signal strength of competing (neighbor\'s) access points and what channels they are on is enough for me to have paid for the app (if they were charging). Any thoughts on an ad-free paid version? I\'ll pay for apps this well done.
reviews.author: Jerry Ham

reviews.title: Never let me down
reviews.comment: This app is great for me. It allows me to test clients networks in minutes :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Just what I needed. Smart. Thank you! Perhaps add a manual refresh button to refresh displays.
reviews.author: M\303\241rton Mih\303\241ltz

reviews.title: Best Wi-Fi analyzer
reviews.comment: Perfect for figuring out which channels to tune your routers to. Also great for figuring out specific password encryptions on all Wi-Fi networks in range. One of my favorite apps now that everything I use is on Wi-Fi.
reviews.author: Caleb Glasgow

reviews.title: Handy
reviews.comment: Helps optimize my network! Interface is functional, but could be a bit sleeker looking
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: It works good.  Would like to be able to ping access points.
reviews.author: Cameron McDaniel

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Works flawlessly. Did exactly what I needed and helped me find the best channel in my apt complex for me to set up my 2.4ghz and 5ghz network
reviews.author: Brandon Kessler

reviews.title: The best.
reviews.comment: This is a great app. The best of it\'s kind by far! I have used it on multiple devices for years and I could not ask more from it. Thanks dev!
reviews.author: Perrin Trease
